ai.summary: A short, easy 1.7 km hike in the UK suitable for families and casual walkers. The route follows gentle, well-marked paths through a rural setting, with minimal elevation and pleasant, accessible terrain.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-maintained paths with occasional grassy or compacted-earth sections. Expect light mud after rain, occasional gates or stiles, and minimal elevation change.
ai.safety_notes: Weather in the UK can change quickly. Wear sturdy footwear, bring a light waterproof layer and enough water. Stay on the marked path, watch for livestock or farm crossings, and carry a charged phone. Let someone know your plans and check in when you return.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light hiking boots
Light waterproof jacket and warm layer
Hat and sunscreen for sunny days
Map, compass or offline GPS; fully charged phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–September) offer milder weather and longer daylight. Winter can be wet and muddy with shorter daylight hours.

seo.title: Crowan BR 66 Ground Truth – Easy 1.7 km UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Discover the easy 1.7 km Crowan BR 66 Ground Truth trail in the UK. Flat terrain, family-friendly pathway, practical safety tips and gear recommendations.
